pullrequest.title: Added texture to the fire hose, added foreground objects to vrc task2

content.raw:
The gazebo grid lines should be disabled, either in the worlds or for cameras in general (former is probably the easier/faster fix for vrc).

Some mud texture instead of constant colour would be good.

All feedback previously given that hasn't been fixed yet still applies. ;)
